discourse_list.title: Moving of my CDP to DAI with LedgerWallet?

content.content: i searched the forum and coulnt find anything… i created my CDP using my Hardware Wallet, atm… @ https://migrate.makerdao.com/ it doesnt offer me to  use my LedgerWallet for the integration to multicollateral DAI … my understand would be it will take a couple of days till the proper integration is written for LedgerWallet… or am i missing something?
This isn’t a collateral discussion I don’t think. Moving to Uncategorized. Some relevant info here: Trezor integration with Oasis? Best to ask in the chat for help though: https://chat.makerdao.com
